-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s2, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| diffsc(s2, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, com)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

|- wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s2, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| diffsc(s2, c2)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: A definition of the transitive predecessors of a class in terms of indexed union. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-Apr-2012.)
